Entries.64780024/e 64780012/n Pregnant1_Elliott/: sappypiano/-100 -100/farmer 19 12 2 Elliott 20 12 2 Harvey 5 15 2/addConversationTopic ElliottBabySleep 14/skippable/pause 500/speak Elliott "Is everything okay, darling? $s #$b# Oh my! Is the baby coming?!$l"/changeLocation Hospital/showFrame 5/ambientLight 150 150 150/viewport 14 11 true/pause 1000/speak Elliott "Are you comfortable?#$b#Or at least as comfortable as you can be?$4"/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 500/emote farmer 60/emote Elliott 28/pause 500/speak Elliott "I wish I could make all the pain go away for you, sweetheart. $s"/pause 500/move Elliott 0 1 3/pause 500/speak Elliott "I'm excited to raise a child with you, @. $h #$b# I wasn't sure if I was ready to be a father before I met you... $s #$b# But I know that we will make a wonderful team. $l"/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -1 3/speak Elliott "You're my everything, @. $l #$b# Thank you for giving this lonely writer a chance."/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Elliott "Just let me know when %kid1 is ready to join us in this marvelous world. I'll be here to hold your hand."/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Elliott "I made a promise to myself when I married you that I would always be there during your time of need. #$b# And that time is now..."/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100 true/warp Harvey 21 12/faceDirection Harvey 3/warp Elliott 20 11/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "Is it time? The baby's coming?$2#$b#I'll get Dr. Harvey. Remember your breathing exercises, darling!"/pause 1500/speak Harvey "That's it @. Just one more push!"/addTemporaryActor {{BabyorBaby_Dark}} 23 15 20 12 2 False Character/positionOffset {{BabyorBaby_Dark}} 0 -50/pause 500/message "Your baby's cry pierces the air."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, your baby's lungs are certainly strong and healthy!$h"/fade/viewport 18 11 true/pause 500/emote Elliott 20/pause 2000/speak Elliott "Oh @. %kid1 is absolutely perfect - just like you.$l"/emote farmer 20 true/emote Harvey 32 false/pause 1500/viewport -100 -100 true/message "Your family just got a little bigger! Time to take your new baby home!"/pause 1000/end

Entries.64780049/e 64780024/t 610 2600: continue/28 30/farmer 27 30 0 Elliott 29 25 3 Harvey 0 0 0/addConversationTopic FarmerPregnantElliott2 13/addMailReceived Pregnant2_Elliott/skippable/pause 1250/viewport move 0 -5 1275/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Elliott "Hello darling! $h #$b# Oh my. You look a bit pale today. #$b# You don't suppose... $s"/pause 500 /emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Elliott "You believe you're pregnant? $l #$b# Let's go see the doctor just in case."/pause 500/viewport -100 100/changeLocation Hospital/viewport 5 5/warp Elliott 2 5/warp farmer 3 5/showFrame Elliott 4/warp Harvey 5 8/move Harvey 0 -3 3 false/showFrame Elliott 4/speak Harvey "Congratulations! $h #$b# It looks like your little %kid1 is going to have a sibling soon."/emote Elliott 16 true/jump Elliott 4/speak Elliott "What a stupendous day! $h"/pause 500/ speak Harvey "Because this is your second child, you can have the baby at home, if you'd like."/pause 500/quickquestion Do you want to have your baby at the clinic or at home?#At the clinic. #At home. (break)speak Harvey "Alright then, I'll make sure that I have a bed open for you in about two weeks. $h #$b# Feel free to stop by before then if you want a checkup."\addMailReceived ClinicBirthElliott (break)speak Harvey "Okay! I'll make sure that my schedule is clear so I can help you deliver the baby at home. $h #$b# In the meantime, you'll want to make sure that the area to the right of the crib is clean. That's where you'll have the baby."\addMailReceived HomeBirthElliott/pause 500/speak Elliott "I feel as if I'm going to float off of the earth, @. $h #$b# I thank my lucky stars that I have you here to ground me."/ emote farmer 8/speak Elliott "Let's go home, darling. We have much to prepare! $h"/emote farmer 12/pause 100/emote Elliott 32/end

Entries.64780050/e 64780049/n Pregnant2_Elliott/: sappypiano/-100 -100/farmer 19 12 2 Elliott 20 12 2 Harvey 5 15 2/positionOffset farmer 0 -12/addConversationTopic ElliottBabySleep2 14/skippable/pause 500/speak Elliott "What did you say, darling? #$b# Oh, the baby is coming? $l #$b# Let's make haste for the clinic. $h"/changeLocation Hospital/showFrame 5/faceDirection Elliott 3/ambientLight 150 150 150/viewport 14 11 true/pause 1000/speak Elliott "I'm pleased we scheduled this with Harvey ahead of time. #$b# And that Leah was available to watch %kid1 while we're gone. #$b# Dare I say this is going much more smoothly than your first birth. $h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Elliott "Though, seeing you in the clinic always makes me teary eyed. $s #$b# The last time we stood here, we were on the precipice of parenthood. #$b# Now, %kid1 runs tirelessly around the house every day. #$b# It's amazing how time flies, is it not? "/pause 500/ textAboveHead Elliott "*sigh*"/pause 1000/speak Elliott "It really wasn't all that long ago that I first laid eyes on you. #$b# I suppose part of me fell in love with you then. There was something so earnest about the sweat on your brow, the muss of your hair. $l #$b# You spoke to me both as a writer and as a human being. #$b# I wanted to get to know you better. To know your story. #$b# To be a part of your next chapters. $l"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Elliott "I know I'm rambling, but I want you to know that you are the light of my life, @. #$b# Without you, I'd still be living in that shack on the beach, trying to finish my novel. #$b# With you... I am the man, writer, and father I always dreamed of being. $l "/pause 500/emote farmer 20/ pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Elliott "Is it time, darling?"/ pause 500/ emote farmer 12/ pause 500/ textAboveHead Elliott "Harvey! It's time!"/fade/viewport -100 -100 true/warp Harvey 21 12/faceDirection Harvey 3/warp Elliott 20 11/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Harvey "Alright, @. Let's have this baby! $h"/pause 1500/speak Harvey "That's it! Just one more push!"/showFrame 0/positionOffset farmer 0 12/addTemporaryActor {{BabyorBaby_Dark}} 23 15 20 12 2 False Character/positionOffset {{BabyorBaby_Dark}} 0 -53/pause 500/message "Your baby's cry pierces the air."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, your baby's lungs seem strong and healthy!$h"/fade/viewport 18 11 true/pause 500/emote Elliott 20/pause 2000/speak Elliott "Oh @. %kid2 is perfect. Just like you. $l"/emote farmer 20 true/emote Harvey 32 false/pause 1500/viewport -100 -100 true/message "Your family just got a little bigger! Time to take your new baby home!"/pause 1000/end
